alert.note: Alert for Eastern Albany; Western Albany (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 5:08PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Albany County through 545 PM EDT... At 508 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Berne, or 15 miles west of Delmar, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause flooding. Locations impacted include... Westerlo, Berne, Altamont, Rensselaerville, Clarksville, East Berne, Zucks Corners, Snyders Corners, Shoefelt Corners, Bensons Corners, Thompsons Lake, Keefers Corners, Thatcher State Park, South Berne, Reidsville, Bramans Corners, New Salem, Wolf Hill and Helderberg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
